      public static String newTarget(List<String> done, String ageName)
      Gets a new target from Age ageName that is not in done list.
      Parameters:
      done - The list of excluded targets
      ageName - The Age name in which list it has to search
      Returns:
      the target as String

    • nextTarget

      public static Pair nextTarget(List<String> done, String ageName, int sameIdx)
      Gets next target in the ageName Age list
      Parameters:
      done - The list of excluded targets
      ageName - The Age name in which list it has to search
      sameIdx - The index from which it will begin to search
      Returns:
      a Pair object that has new index as Key and target as Value

    • getAgeInv

      public static org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory getAgeInv(String age, org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory current, int modifier)
      Gets Inventory in inventories list of a specific Age and depending on a clicked itemName
      Parameters:
      age - The Age inventory list
      current - The current age that is open
      modifier - The modifier is 1 if player want to move to next page and -1 if he wants to go backwards
      Returns:
      the inventory to display to the player
